text: Ezɨ e Filipain ikiavɨra itima, Yis puvatɨzir Bretɨn Dughiaba gɨvazɨ, e kurim inigha Filipai ataki. Ezɨ 5plan dughiaba ua gɨvazɨ e ghua Troasɨn gumazir e bagha mɨzuaiba batifi. Egha 7plan dughiaba Troasɨn iti.20:6 Fofozir gumazir avɨrim kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, Pol Filipain otogha, Luk inigha a ko ghu. Kamaghɨn amizɨma mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevir kam iti, “e.” (Nɨ Aposel 16:10, an gan.)
